Version 0.0.28 Released!

by Dave Vandenbout — 17 Dec 2019

Well, that didn’t last long.

I released version 0.0.27 of SKiDL yesterday, but I didn’t like having the zyc utility bundled in there because that pulls in wxpython as a requirement. That’s likely to cause problems for some people when they try to install it with pip.

So I made zyc a separate utility you can install, and removed it from the newly-released 0.0.28 version of SKiDL.

This is the last SKiDL release for this year. I mean it this time. Really.

Author:

Dave Vandenbout

devb@xess.com

Relax, I do this stuff for a living.
